item.name: Samsung Galaxy S9 Plus 64GB Midnight Black
item.discription: Screen (6.2, Super AMOLED, 2960х1440) / Samsung Exynos 9810 (4 x 2.7 GHz + 4 x 1.7 GHz) / Dual main camera: 12 Mp + 12 Mp, front: 8 Mp / RAM 6 GB / 64 GB of internal memory + microSD (up to 400 GB) / 3G / LTE / GPS / support for 2 SIM cards (Nano-SIM) / Android 8.0 (Oreo) / 3500 mA. It supports the installation of two SIM-cards or one SIM-card and a memory card. The slot for the second SIM card is combined with a slot for the memory card.
